original: de'i rjes la yang mthe bo gang du rkang pa gcig gis mchog pa'i ri mo zlum po gcig @266b po ni rdo rje phreng ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la yang mthe bo gang du rkang pa gcig gis mchog pa'i ri mo zlum po gcig @266b po ni rdo rje phreng ba'i don du'o //
translated: After that, one should draw a circle with one foot at the thumb.

original: de nas de'i rjes la sor lnga pa'i ri mo phra mo gcig phyogs bzhi po rnams su'o //
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la sor lnga pa'i ri mo phra mo gcig phyogs bzhi po rnams su'o //
translated: Then, after that, one should draw a fine line of five finger-widths in the four directions.

original: de nas rkang pa gcig gis ma chog pa'i mthe bong gang gi ri mo'o //
analyzed: de nas rkang pa gcig gis ma chog pa'i mthe bong gang gi ri mo'o //
translated: Then, one should draw a line with one foot at the thumb.

original: de ltar re'u mig dgur gnas pa las lhag pa'i ri mo rnams phyis la ji ltar mdzes par re'u mig dang ka ba rnams bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar re'u mig dgur gnas pa las lhag pa'i ri mo rnams phyis la ji ltar mdzes par re'u mig dang ka ba rnams bri bar bya'o //
translated: In this way, having drawn nine squares, one should erase the extra lines and draw the squares and pillars as one likes.

original: de nas shar phyogs kyi tshangs pa'i skud pa las lhag par rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du ri mo mthe bong phyed dang gnyis ni tshon sna'i sa'i don du ste /

analyzed: me dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'am thig gcig gis khyad par skud pa gcig gdab par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas grva zhes bya ba tshon sna lnga'i don du'o ;
translated: Then, the “corners” are for the sake of the five colors.

analyzed: de nas logs su sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad du rkang pas mchog pa'i mthe bo gang gi dbus su 'gram zhes bya ste ri mo lnga'i don du skud pa gnyis gnyis so //
translated: Then, in the middle, two lines are called “sides,” which are one cubit long.

original: de nas phyogs zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de nas phyogs zhes pa ste /
translated: Then, in the

original: ri mo lnga'i don du sor phra ba phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad rkang pa gcig gis mchog pa'i mthe bo gang ba'i dbus su skud pa gnyis gnyis so //
analyzed: ri mo lnga'i don du sor phra ba phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad rkang pa gcig gis mchog pa'i mthe bo gang ba'i dbus su skud pa gnyis gnyis so //
translated: For the five lines, the measure of half an inch and a quarter is the width of a thumb, and in the middle of that, two strings are laid down.

original: de nas ngos gnyis su khyab par ni phrag gong zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nas ngos gnyis su khyab par ni phrag gong zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Then, on both sides, the measure of a shoulder is the width of two thumbs.

analyzed: ri mo lnga'i don du rkang pa gcig gis mchog pa'i mthe bo gang ba'i dbus su skud pa gnyis gdab par bya'o //
translated: For the five lines, the measure of a thumb is the width of two strings laid down in the middle of that.

original: de'i rjes la rgya gram las pha rol tu mthe ba gang ba'i tshad tsam rin chen tha gu'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la rgya gram las pha rol tu mthe ba gang ba'i tshad tsam rin chen tha gu'i don du'o //
translated: After that, from the cross, the measure of a thumb is the width of a precious rope.

original: logs kyi skud pa gcig po ngos gnyis su gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: logs kyi skud pa gcig po ngos gnyis su gdab par bya'o //
translated: The single string on the side is laid down on both sides.

original: de nas rin chen pha gu las phyi rol du logs las rkang pas mchog pa'i mthe bong gang bor ba dang / yang rkang pas mchog pa'i mthe bong gang gi bar du skud pa gnyis ngos gnyis su gdab pa ni ka ba'i don du'o //

translated: Then, from the precious ledge, outside, the measure of a thumb is the width of two strings laid down on both sides for the sake of the pillars.

original: ya phubs kyi steng du rkang pas mchog pa'i mthe bong gang ni ka ba'i mgo bor gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: ya phubs kyi steng du rkang pas mchog pa'i mthe bong gang ni ka ba'i mgo bor gdab par bya'o //
translated: The top of the capital should be placed on the top of the pillar, with the thumb of the foot not reaching.

original: de nas ka ba'i phyi rol gyi ngos gnyis su rin chen snam bu las phyi rol du sor phyed dang gnyis kyi skud pa gcig po ni gzungs kyi snam bu'i ngos gnyis su gdab par bya'o //

translated: Then, on the two sides outside of the pillar, the single thread of one and a half fingerbreadths from the jewel ledge should be placed on the two sides of the dhāraṇī ledge.

original: de nas @267a * //
analyzed: de nas @267a * //
translated: Then,

original: rin chen snam bu'i don du sngar bzhin du skung ba gcig go //
analyzed: rin chen snam bu'i don du sngar bzhin du skung ba gcig go //
translated: the single thread for the jewel ledge is as before.

original: de nas rin chen snam bu las phyi rol du mthe bong phyed dang gnyis kyi skud pa gcig po ste dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de nas rin chen snam bu las phyi rol du mthe bong phyed dang gnyis kyi skud pa gcig po ste dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i don du'o //
translated: Then, the single thread of one and a half fingerbreadths outside the jewel ledge is for the lattice and half-lattice.

original: de nas sngar bzhin du rin chen snam bu'i skud pa'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar bzhin du rin chen snam bu'i skud pa'o //
translated: Then, the thread of the jewel ledge is as before.

original: de nas ka ba'i mgo'i steng du ngos las rkang pas ma chog pa'i mtheb gang bor bar bcu gcig rdo rjes mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: de nas ka ba'i mgo'i steng du ngos las rkang pas ma chog pa'i mtheb gang bor bar bcu gcig rdo rjes mtshon pa'o //
translated: Then, on top of the capital, the thumb of the foot not reaching is placed, marked with eleven vajras.

original: rdo rje'i bla re ni rkang pas mchog ba'i mtheb gang tsam ka ba'i mgo bo las 'phyang zhing shar bu gnyis g-yo ba ji ltar mdzes pas so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bla re ni rkang pas mchog ba'i mtheb gang tsam ka ba'i mgo bo las 'phyang zhing shar bu gnyis g-yo ba ji ltar mdzes pas so //
translated: The vajra canopy is a cubit in size, hanging from the top of the pillars, with two hanging tassels, beautiful in any way.

original: de nas dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i mtshams kyi snam bu la chu srin gyi gdong pa bdun po rnams te ;
analyzed: de nas dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i mtshams kyi snam bu la chu srin gyi gdong pa bdun po rnams te ;
translated: Then, on the band between the net and half-net, there are seven crocodile faces.

original: rin po che'i snam bu las btags pa de'i kha'i ngos gnyis nas mu tig gi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i snam bu las btags pa de'i kha'i ngos gnyis nas mu tig gi phreng ba'o //
translated: From the two sides of the mouth of that which is attached to the jeweled band, there is a pearl necklace.

original: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa kun gyi dbus su padma'i gdan la gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dang / nyi ma la gnas pa'i rin po che'i steng du rdo rje phyed pa rnams rab tu 'phyang bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa kun gyi dbus su padma'i gdan la gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dang / nyi ma la gnas pa'i rin po che'i steng du rdo rje phyed pa rnams rab tu 'phyang bar gyur pa'o //
translated: In the center of all the nets and half-nets, there are half-moons standing on lotus seats, and on top of the jewels standing on the suns, there are half-vajras hanging down.

original: chu srin gyi kha'i dbus su 'phyang ba rnams ni che zhing dri ma med pa'i nor bu rtse mo gcig btags pas mdzes par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chu srin gyi kha'i dbus su 'phyang ba rnams ni che zhing dri ma med pa'i nor bu rtse mo gcig btags pas mdzes par gyur ba'o //
translated: Those hanging in the center of the crocodile mouths are large, beautiful with a single-pointed, stainless jewel.

original: ngos gnyis kyi phreng ba ni cung zad chung ba ste phreng ba gsum mo //
analyzed: ngos gnyis kyi phreng ba ni cung zad chung ba ste phreng ba gsum mo //
translated: The two side garlands are slightly smaller, making three garlands.

original: de nas sgo'i ngos gnyis kyi tshon gyi sa gzhi la padma'i steng du gnas pa'i bum pa gnyis kyang ji ltar mdzes par bri bar bya'o ;
analyzed: de nas sgo'i ngos gnyis kyi tshon gyi sa gzhi la padma'i steng du gnas pa'i bum pa gnyis kyang ji ltar mdzes par bri bar bya'o ;
translated: Then, on the colored ground of the two sides of the door, two vases standing on lotus flowers should also be drawn beautifully.

original: / gzungs zhes bya ba ni snam bu yang brtse ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: / gzungs zhes bya ba ni snam bu yang brtse ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The so-called dhāraṇī is also a cloth with compassion.

original: de nas grva bzhi po rnams su rdo rjes mtshan pa'i nor bu dbyig pa la btags pa'i rnga ma g-yo zhing 'khrol ba'o //
analyzed: de nas grva bzhi po rnams su rdo rjes mtshan pa'i nor bu dbyig pa la btags pa'i rnga ma g-yo zhing 'khrol ba'o //
translated: Then, in the four corners, a jewel marked with a vajra should be drawn, hanging and swinging from a staff.

original: 'phan gyi tshar tshar yang mthar sleb pa'i ji ltar legs pa gdugs dang yang ngo //
analyzed: 'phan gyi tshar tshar yang mthar sleb pa'i ji ltar legs pa gdugs dang yang ngo //
translated: The ends of the streamers are also well-placed, along with parasols.

original: ka ba dang rin chen snam bu'i dbus su yang bum pa bzang po la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ka ba dang rin chen snam bu'i dbus su yang bum pa bzang po la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the center of the pillar and jeweled cloth, a wish-fulfilling tree standing in an excellent vase should be drawn.

original: ngos dang ka ba'i bar gyi mthongs su rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ngos dang ka ba'i bar gyi mthongs su rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the sky between the sides and pillars, a vajra jewel should be drawn.

original: rdo rje'i bla re'i steng du me tog gi phreng ba'i snam bu ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i bla re'i steng du me tog gi phreng ba'i snam bu ste /
translated: Above the vajra canopy, there is a garland of flowers.

original: mthe bong gnyis su rgyas pa /
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis su rgyas pa /
translated: It is extended in two fingerbreadths at the two thumbs.

original: ngos gnyis su rkang pa gnyis kyis lhag pa gru bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: ngos gnyis su rkang pa gnyis kyis lhag pa gru bzhi pa'o //
translated: It is extended in two fingerbreadths on the two sides, and it is square.

original: de'i rjes la nor bu ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la nor bu ste /
translated: After that, there is the jewel.

original: rkang pa gsum gyis rgyas pa ring ba ni me tog dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pa gsum gyis rgyas pa ring ba ni me tog dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is extended in three fingerbreadths, and its length is equal to the flower.

original: de nas ngos gnyis su rkang pas chung ba pha gu'i snam bu'o //
analyzed: de nas ngos gnyis su rkang pas chung ba pha gu'i snam bu'o //
translated: Then, on the two sides, it is reduced in two fingerbreadths, and it is the ledge.

original: rkang pa gnyis kyis che ba rta'i rmig pa dang 'dra ba mdog sna tshogs pa'i rmig pa lta bu'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis kyis che ba rta'i rmig pa dang 'dra ba mdog sna tshogs pa'i rmig pa lta bu'i dbus su'o //
translated: It is extended in two fingerbreadths, and it is in the center of the hoof, which is like a hoof with various colors.

original: de nas mdog bzang po'i snam @267b bu'i zheng dang bcas pa mdog ser po ngos gnyis su rkang pa gnyis gnyis kyis chung ba'o //
analyzed: de nas mdog bzang po'i snam @267b bu'i zheng dang bcas pa mdog ser po ngos gnyis su rkang pa gnyis gnyis kyis chung ba'o //
translated: Then, the ledge of good color, together with the width of the ledge, is reduced in two fingerbreadths on the two sides.

original: de nas mun pa'i snam bu zheng du mthe bong gnyis pa /
analyzed: de nas mun pa'i snam bu zheng du mthe bong gnyis pa /
translated: Then, the ledge of darkness is two fingerbreadths in width.

original: ngos gnyis su mthe bong gnyis chung ba'o //
analyzed: ngos gnyis su mthe bong gnyis chung ba'o //
translated: It is reduced in two fingerbreadths on the two sides.

original: de nas sngar gyi mdog bzang po'i snam bu'o //
analyzed: de nas sngar gyi mdog bzang po'i snam bu'o //
translated: Then, it is the ledge of good color as before.

original: de nas rmig rjes lta bu'i snam bu zheng du rkang pa gnyis so //
analyzed: de nas rmig rjes lta bu'i snam bu zheng du rkang pa gnyis so //
translated: Then, the ledge of the hoof is two fingerbreadths in width.

original: mdog bzang po'i snam bu las ngos gnyis su rkang pa gnyis kyis lhag pa'o //
analyzed: mdog bzang po'i snam bu las ngos gnyis su rkang pa gnyis kyis lhag pa'o //
translated: The good-colored band is two cubits on each side, with two feet in excess.

original: de nas nor bu ni zheng du rkang pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de nas nor bu ni zheng du rkang pa gsum pa'o //
translated: Then the jewel is three cubits in width.

original: ngos gnyis su rkang pa lhag pa'o //
analyzed: ngos gnyis su rkang pa lhag pa'o //
translated: It is two cubits on each side.

original: de nas rmig rjes lta bu'i snam bu bzhi ni sngar gyi rmig rjes lta bu'i snam bu bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas rmig rjes lta bu'i snam bu bzhi ni sngar gyi rmig rjes lta bu'i snam bu bzhin no //
translated: Then the four bands like a horse's hoof are like the four bands like a horse's hoof above.

original: de nas gser gyi snam bu ni sngar gyi mdog bzhin no //🔽de nas kra ma shirsha ni steng du mthe bong phyed dang gnyis pa ngos gnyis su mthe bong gi rkang pa rkang pas chung ba'o //
analyzed: de nas gser gyi snam bu ni sngar gyi mdog bzhin no // de nas kra ma shirsha ni steng du mthe bong phyed dang gnyis pa ngos gnyis su mthe bong gi rkang pa rkang pas chung ba'o //
translated: Then the golden band is like the color above.🔽Then the kramaśiras is one and a half thumbs above, with a thumb's length on each side.

original: de nas rkang pa gcig gi tshad padma'i gdan gyi steng du rkang pa dang bcas pa'i sor mo'i tshad ri dags kyi lus kyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: de nas rkang pa gcig gi tshad padma'i gdan gyi steng du rkang pa dang bcas pa'i sor mo'i tshad ri dags kyi lus kyi dbus su'o //
translated: Then the lotus seat, one cubit in size, with a finger's width on top, is in the middle of the deer's body.

original: de'i skye ni sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
analyzed: de'i skye ni sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
translated: Its neck is one and a half finger-widths in size.

original: mgo bo ni sor mo phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
analyzed: mgo bo ni sor mo phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
translated: The head is one and a half finger-widths in size.

original: de'i steng du sor mo phyed bor bar ri mo gcig gis bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du sor mo phyed bor bar ri mo gcig gis bskor bar bya'o //
translated: On top of that, one should draw a half-finger-width circle.

original: de'i phyi rol du padma'i phreng ba mthe bo gsum gyi tshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du padma'i phreng ba mthe bo gsum gyi tshad do //
translated: Outside of that, a lotus garland three finger-widths wide.

original: de'i phyi rol du rdo rje phreng ba sor gsum gyi tshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du rdo rje phreng ba sor gsum gyi tshad do //
translated: Outside of that, a vajra garland three finger-widths wide.

original: ji ltar mdzes par 'od zer lnga dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mdzes par 'od zer lnga dang bcas pa'o //
translated: As is pleasing, with five light rays.

original: de ltar ngos re rer khru gang grva las phyi rol du'o //
analyzed: de ltar ngos re rer khru gang grva las phyi rol du'o //
translated: In that way, each side is one cubit outside of the corners.

original: de nas nang du khru gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nas nang du khru gang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum du gyur pa'o //
translated: Then, the inner maṇḍala is one cubit, triangular.

original: de nas ri dags gnyis kyi dbus su rkang pa gcig gis mchog pa'i mtheb gang gi padma'i gdan gyi steng du rkang pas mchog pa'i mtheb gang ba'i gdan por te 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu gnyis pa sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
analyzed: de nas ri dags gnyis kyi dbus su rkang pa gcig gis mchog pa'i mtheb gang gi padma'i gdan gyi steng du rkang pas mchog pa'i mtheb gang ba'i gdan por te 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu gnyis pa sor phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
translated: Then, in the middle of the two deer, one should draw a lotus seat with one foot and a thumb, and a seat with a foot and a thumb on top of that, a twelve-spoked wheel two and a half finger-widths wide.

original: dbu ma'i rtse mo dag la'o //
analyzed: dbu ma'i rtse mo dag la'o //
translated: On the tips of the central one.

original: rtse mo gzhan pa bzhi rnams ni ngos gnyis su bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rtse mo gzhan pa bzhi rnams ni ngos gnyis su bri bar bya'o //
translated: The other four tips should be drawn on two sides.

original: ri dags gnyis kyi mdun du 'phan gnyis 'phyang ba ni ri dags kyi mjug ma la slebs pa'o //
analyzed: ri dags gnyis kyi mdun du 'phan gnyis 'phyang ba ni ri dags kyi mjug ma la slebs pa'o //
translated: Two banners hanging in front of the two deer are attached to the tails of the deer.

original: ri dags kyi phyi phyogs kra ma shirsha'i steng du shar dang / nub dang byang dang lho ji lta ba'i rim pas kha phyi phyogs su bltas pa'i seng ge dang / dang pa'i rgyal po dang / rma bya dang / chu srin gnyis gnyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ri dags kyi phyi phyogs kra ma shirsha'i steng du shar dang / nub dang byang dang lho ji lta ba'i rim pas kha phyi phyogs su bltas pa'i seng ge dang / dang pa'i rgyal po dang / rma bya dang / chu srin gnyis gnyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: On the outside of the deer, on the top of the Kramaśira, one should draw two lions, two elephants, two peacocks, and two crocodiles, facing outward in the east, west, north, and south directions, respectively.

original: de ltar khru gang nas brtsams te ji srid khru stong pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar khru gang nas brtsams te ji srid khru stong pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should draw the maṇḍala starting from one cubit up to one thousand cubits.

original: shes rab @268a * //
analyzed: shes rab @268a * //
translated: Wisdom

original: ces pa ni thig 'debs pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni thig 'debs pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: means skilled in laying out the lines.

original: zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa //
translated: Engaging in pacifying and so forth

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las byed pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las byed pa ste /
translated: means performing the activities of pacifying, increasing, controlling, destroying, and so forth.

original: khyad par ni dbus su gnas pa'i mdog dang mtshan ma'i dbye ba las so //
analyzed: khyad par ni dbus su gnas pa'i mdog dang mtshan ma'i dbye ba las so //
translated: The difference is from the division of the colors and signs in the center.

original: las kyi rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
translated: The karma-vajra is the crossed vajra.

original: rtse mo lnga pa ni rva lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rtse mo lnga pa ni rva lnga pa'o //
translated: The five-peaked one is the five-pronged one.

original: mnyam ldan pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi po rnams la'o //
analyzed: mnyam ldan pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi po rnams la'o //
translated: The equal-endowed one is in the four directions.

original: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni de'i mu khyud la gnas pa ste gzhal yas khang gi nang gi rim pa'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni de'i mu khyud la gnas pa ste gzhal yas khang gi nang gi rim pa'i dbus su'o //
translated: In its center means in the center of the inner courtyard of the celestial mansion, located in its circumference.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: The vajra is a five-pronged black vajra.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba zhes pa ni 'od zer rdo rje'i rnam pa can no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba zhes pa ni 'od zer rdo rje'i rnam pa can no //
translated: The blazing vajra is light rays in the form of vajras.

original: shar gyi rtsibs zhes pa ni nang gi rim pa nyid do //
analyzed: shar gyi rtsibs zhes pa ni nang gi rim pa nyid do //
translated: The eastern spoke is the inner courtyard itself.

original: shar du'o // 'khor lo zhes pa zhes pa ni 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: shar du'o // 'khor lo zhes pa zhes pa ni 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
translated: In the east. The wheel is an eight-spoked white wheel.

original: 'od zer zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i rdo rje'i 'od zer nyid do //
analyzed: 'od zer zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i rdo rje'i 'od zer nyid do //
translated: The light rays are the light rays of the vajra wheel.

original: rin po che zhes pa ni mdog ser po cha dgu pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che zhes pa ni mdog ser po cha dgu pa'o //
translated: The jewel is a nine-faceted yellow jewel.

original: padma r'a ga'i mdangs 'dra'i 'od //
analyzed: padma r'a ga'i mdangs 'dra'i 'od //
translated: The light is like the radiance of a ruby.

original: ces bya ba ni 'od zer dmar po'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'od zer dmar po'o //
translated: The light rays are red.

original: ral gri ljang gu zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ral gri ljang gu zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The green sword is the remainder.

original: sna tshogs 'bar ba zhes pa ni 'od zer rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'bar ba zhes pa ni 'od zer rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The “blazing variety” is the five-colored light rays.

original: de ltar nang gi rim pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga'i mtshan ma bris la /
analyzed: de ltar nang gi rim pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga'i mtshan ma bris la /
translated: Thus, in the inner circle, one should draw the symbols of the five tathāgatas.

original: de dag nyid kyi grva bzhi po rnams su mtshan ma bstan pa'i don du shar phyogs kyi grva zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste shar gyi mtshams su zhes bya ba ni me nyid du'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi grva bzhi po rnams su mtshan ma bstan pa'i don du shar phyogs kyi grva zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste shar gyi mtshams su zhes bya ba ni me nyid du'o //
translated: In order to indicate the symbols in the four corners of those very [circles], [the Bhagavān] declares, “In the eastern corner,” and so forth. “In the east” is in the southeast.

original: lho ru zhes pa ni bden bral du'o //
analyzed: lho ru zhes pa ni bden bral du'o //
translated: “In the south” is in the southwest.

original: nub tu zhes pa ni rlung du'o //
analyzed: nub tu zhes pa ni rlung du'o //
translated: “In the west” is in the northwest.

original: byang du zhes pa ni dbang ldan du'o //
analyzed: byang du zhes pa ni dbang ldan du'o //
translated: “In the north” is in the northeast.

original: phyi rol gyi rim pa'i sgo bzhi po rnams su mtshan ma bri ba'i don du thob zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rim pa'i sgo bzhi po rnams su mtshan ma bri ba'i don du thob zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: In order to indicate the symbols in the four outer gates, [the Bhagavān] declares, “hammer,” and so forth.

original: de la tho ba ni nag po rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: de la tho ba ni nag po rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
translated: There, the hammer is black, marked with a three-pointed vajra.

original: dbyig pa ni dkar po rdo rje rtse gsum pa nag pos mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: dbyig pa ni dkar po rdo rje rtse gsum pa nag pos mtshan pa'o //
translated: The club is white, marked with a three-pointed black vajra.

original: padma ni padma dmar po'o //
analyzed: padma ni padma dmar po'o //
translated: The lotus is a red lotus.

original: rdo rje ral gri ni ljang gu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri ni ljang gu'o //
translated: The vajra sword is green.

original: phyi rol gyi 'phar ma grva bzhi po rnams su ma gsungs pa nyid ni thod pa rnam pa bzhi po rnams su shes par bya ste /🔽mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi 'phar ma grva bzhi po rnams su ma gsungs pa nyid ni thod pa rnam pa bzhi po rnams su shes par bya ste / mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
translated: The four external corners are not mentioned, but they should be known as the four skull-pieces.

original: zhes gsungs pa las so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa las so //
translated: All the characteristics are completely perfect.

original: gzhan du ni dman pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ni dman pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow that they are inferior.

original: lha'i gdan gyi rim pas mtshan ma'i gdan rnams su yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lha'i gdan gyi rim pas mtshan ma'i gdan rnams su yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The symbolic seats should be known as the divine seats.

original: rdzogs pa zhes pa ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgo rnams su rab tu zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa zhes pa ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgo rnams su rab tu zhugs pa ste /
translated: The word complete means that the mandala of gnosis has entered the doors.

original: bya ba gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not depend on any other action.

original: @268b sangs rgyas zhes pa ni mtshan ma'i tshul du gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: @268b sangs rgyas zhes pa ni mtshan ma'i tshul du gnas pa rnams so //
translated: The word buddha refers to those who abide in the symbolic mode.

original: the tshom med par zhes bya ba ni bden pa mngon par zhen pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom med par zhes bya ba ni bden pa mngon par zhen pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa'o //
translated: Without doubt means abandoning the apprehended and apprehender that are fixated on the truth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: All tathāgatas and so forth are as before.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la chen po yang de yin la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la chen po yang de yin la /
translated: The great mandala is great because it is the basis of the great result.🔽

original: dkyil 'khor yang de yin pas dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor yang de yin pas dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
translated: The great mandala is that which is great and also a mandala, thus it is the great mandala.

original: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni le'u ste /
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni le'u ste /
translated: The collection of texts that teach it is a chapter.

original: le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the second chapter is finished.🔽The request for the mandala rite🔽Having praised for the sake of drawing the mandala, one should request.🔽That is stated by “Then the Blessed One” and so on.

original: // / dkyil 'khor bri ba'i don du bstod pa byas pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes pa de gsungs pa de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste bdag po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: // / dkyil 'khor bri ba'i don du bstod pa byas pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes pa de gsungs pa de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste bdag po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The lord is Vajrasattva.

original: bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: The king of praises is the verses that will be explained, beginning with “mandala” and so on.

original: gsol ba gdab pa zhes pa ni zhus pa rnams so ;🔽/ sdig pa thams cad ces pa ni /
analyzed: gsol ba gdab pa zhes pa ni zhus pa rnams so ; / sdig pa thams cad ces pa ni /
translated: The request is the questions.

original: srog gcod pa la sogs pa bgyid pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang pa'o //
analyzed: srog gcod pa la sogs pa bgyid pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang pa'o //
translated: All misdeeds are killing and so on, done by oneself, caused to be done by others, or rejoiced in.

original: 'jigs zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bzhin no //🔽dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo ste /
analyzed: 'jigs zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bzhin no // dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo ste /
translated: The fear is as before.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dir gsungs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor las gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dir gsungs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor las gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: The chief of all mandalas is the chief of the mandalas of Vajradaka and so forth taught here.

original: rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor lha'i 'khor lo rdzogs nas bza' btung gsungs pa /
analyzed: rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor lha'i 'khor lo rdzogs nas bza' btung gsungs pa /
translated: Having completed the divine wheel of the mandala of colored powders or the mandala of meditation, he teaches the eating and drinking:

original: de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then again, and so forth.

original: bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni 'og tu yam yig yongs su gyur pa las grva gnyis su ba dan g-yo ba gnyis kyis mtshan pa gzhu'i rnam pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni 'og tu yam yig yongs su gyur pa las grva gnyis su ba dan g-yo ba gnyis kyis mtshan pa gzhu'i rnam pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The nectar is the wind mandala in the form of a bow, marked with two fluttering pennants at the two corners, from the transformation of the syllable yam below.

original: de'i steng du ram yig yongs su gyur pa'i me la /
analyzed: de'i steng du ram yig yongs su gyur pa'i me la /
translated: On that, from the transformation of the syllable ram, is fire,

original: aa yongs su gyur pa'i thod pa'i nang du go kud ha na'i gzugs kyis bza' ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: aa yongs su gyur pa'i thod pa'i nang du go kud ha na'i gzugs kyis bza' ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: and in the skull-cup which is the transformation of the syllable a, the food and so forth are in the form of cow's milk and so forth.

original: rlung gis bskul nas mes bsros pa'i thod par zhu bar gyur pa /
analyzed: rlung gis bskul nas mes bsros pa'i thod par zhu bar gyur pa /
translated: The wind stirs it, and the fire heats it, and it melts in the skull-cup.

original: aom yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: aom yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: Blessed by the syllable om.

original: de'i thig le las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bkug ste ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang gcig tu byas pa'i bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: de'i thig le las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bkug ste ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang gcig tu byas pa'i bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The light rays that arise from that drop draw in the essence of all the tathagatas, and they become one with the nectar of gnosis, the five kinds of nectar.

original: de myang ba ni nye par longs spyad pa'o //🔽de'i @269a * //
analyzed: de myang ba ni nye par longs spyad pa'o // de'i @269a * //
translated: Tasting means enjoying.

original: dam tshig ni brda'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni brda'o //
translated: The pledge is the symbol.

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni nges par phyung ba ste rab tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni nges par phyung ba ste rab tu bstan pa'o //
translated: The consecration mantra is the extraction, the teaching.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags zhes gsungs te /
translated: The consecration mantra is taught.

original: aom la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is om and so forth.

original: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab //
translated: Consecrate with the three syllables.

original: ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: With the vajra-tongue yoga,

original: zhes bya ba ni h'um yig las lce rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rnam par byas la de las byung ba'i 'od zer sbu gu'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni h'um yig las lce rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rnam par byas la de las byung ba'i 'od zer sbu gu'i rnam pas so //
translated: means that the tongue is made into the form of a single-pronged vajra by the syllable hum, and the light rays that arise from that are in the form of a tube.

original: de'i dgos pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i dgos pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the purpose of that?

original: mnyes pa ste dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: mnyes pa ste dgyes pa'o //
translated: It is pleasing, delighting.

original: rdo rje can kun zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dang dkyil 'khor pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can kun zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dang dkyil 'khor pa'o //
translated: All the vajra-holders refers to the lords of the mandala and the members of the mandala.

original: gang gi tshe bdud rtsi myang bar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bdud rtsi myang bar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: When should one partake of the nectar?

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is stated:🔽Having invited the perfect buddhas,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba rnams rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bkug ste nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba rnams rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bkug ste nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas pa'o //
translated: who are similar to the pledge mandala, with light rays from the seed in one's heart center, they are situated in the space quarter.

original: ye shes 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: ye shes 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The source of gnosis, by nature

original: zhes bya ba ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis so //🔽dgug pa dang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis so // dgug pa dang zhes pa ni /
translated: refers to the nature of dreams and illusions.🔽The invitation

original: bkug pa'i lha'i 'khor lo la mchod yon la sogs pa phul te shin tu nye bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: bkug pa'i lha'i 'khor lo la mchod yon la sogs pa phul te shin tu nye bar byas pa'o //
translated: is the offering of water for welcoming, etc., to the divine wheel that has been invited and is made very near.

original: bzhugs pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bzhugs pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The abiding

original: dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo dag gcig tu byas pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo dag gcig tu byas pa'o //
translated: is the unification of the pledge wheel and the gnosis wheel.

original: bcings pa zhes pa ni rab tu bcug pa las 'gro bar mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: bcings pa zhes pa ni rab tu bcug pa las 'gro bar mi byed pa'o //
translated: “Bound” means not going out from being well placed.

original: dbang du byed pa zhes pa ni bcings pa'i sdug bsngal btang ste bde bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dbang du byed pa zhes pa ni bcings pa'i sdug bsngal btang ste bde bar gyur pa'o //
translated: “Subjugated” means having given up the suffering of being bound, one becomes happy.

original: yang / tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis //
analyzed: yang / tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis //
translated: And, “with the four mantras of the hammer, etc.”

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means:

original: aom mudga r'a dza: aom danda h'um /
analyzed: aom mudga r'a dza: aom danda h'um /
translated: Oṃ mudgara jaḥ, Oṃ daṇḍa hūṃ,

original: aom padma pam /
analyzed: aom padma pam /
translated: Oṃ padma pam,🔽Oṃ khaḍga hoḥ.

original: aom khadga ho: zhes pa 'di dag gi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'am /
analyzed: aom khadga ho: zhes pa 'di dag gi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'am /
translated: These are in the order given.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa 'dis so ;
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa 'dis so ;
translated: Or, “jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ” is used.

original: / gshin rje gshed po gang zhig gang la bcibs nas bsgom par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: / gshin rje gshed po gang zhig gang la bcibs nas bsgom par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: On what and riding what should one meditate on Yamāri?🔽It is said:

original: ma he rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ma he rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: “on a great buffalo, a vajra, and so on.”

original: ma he ni ma he chen po ste /
analyzed: ma he ni ma he chen po ste /
translated: A “great buffalo” is a great water buffalo.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje'o //
translated: On top of that is a vajra.

original: rdo rje bdud las rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste gdan du byas zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud las rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste gdan du byas zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: Meditating on the vajra samādhi of conquering the demons, one makes it one’s seat. The rest is clear.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'o //
translated: The “master of the maṇḍala” is the principal figure of the maṇḍala.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The secret mandala is the mandala of the moon.

original: gti mug rdo rje ni gti mug gshin rje gshed do //🔽bdun gyi bdun pa ni lha ste /
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje ni gti mug gshin rje gshed do // bdun gyi bdun pa ni lha ste /
translated: Mohavajra is Yamântaka of Delusion.🔽The seventh of the seven is the deity.

original: gang la de'i bdun gyi bdun pa can nyi ma'o //
analyzed: gang la de'i bdun gyi bdun pa can nyi ma'o //
translated: The seventh of the seven is the sun.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni nyi ma'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni nyi ma'o //
translated: The mandala is the sun.

original: @269b las kyi rdo rje ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: @269b las kyi rdo rje ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed do //
translated: Karmavajra is Yamântaka of Envy.

original: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs la sna tshogs padma'i steng du ji ltar rigs pa nyi ma dang / zla ba la gnas pa rang rang gi mtshan ma tsam bri bar bya'o //🔽bsgom pa'i bdag nyid dang / bzlas pa rig pa bos lha'i rnal 'byor gang gis bya ba gang gi bstan pa'i don du //
analyzed: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs la sna tshogs padma'i steng du ji ltar rigs pa nyi ma dang / zla ba la gnas pa rang rang gi mtshan ma tsam bri bar bya'o // bsgom pa'i bdag nyid dang / bzlas pa rig pa bos lha'i rnal 'byor gang gis bya ba gang gi bstan pa'i don du //
translated: In the case of the mandala of colored powders, one should draw on a variegated lotus, just the insignia of each deity, as appropriate, on the sun and moon.🔽The meaning of the statement that the deity yoga of the one who is intent on meditation and mantra repetition should be done by means of the deity yoga of the one who is intent on the performance of the rites is as follows.

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: The one called Karmavajra is the yoga of Yamântaka of Envy.

original: thams cad ces pa ni kun te /
analyzed: thams cad ces pa ni kun te /
translated: All means all.

original: gang ji srid da ltar brjod pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang ji srid da ltar brjod pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of as long as is as stated.

original: mi tshil zhes pa ni skyes bu pas da pa'i sha dang / rus pa'i mar khu'o //
analyzed: mi tshil zhes pa ni skyes bu pas da pa'i sha dang / rus pa'i mar khu'o //
translated: The human fat is the marrow of the flesh and bones of a killed man.

original: mi skra zhes pa ni skyes bu bsad pa'i skras ra ba dang lhan cig pa'o //
analyzed: mi skra zhes pa ni skyes bu bsad pa'i skras ra ba dang lhan cig pa'o //
translated: The human hair is the hair of a killed man, together with the bristles.

original: dur khrod du mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'am brgyad pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: dur khrod du mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'am brgyad pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The charnel ground is the fourteenth or eighth day of the waning fortnight.

original: btang zhes pa la mi'i thod pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //🔽rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: btang zhes pa la mi'i thod pa zhes pa lhag ma'o // rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: The skull of a man is the remainder.

original: zhes pa ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The application of the vajra action is the form of jealous-god-Yama.

original: mig sman zhes pa ni dreg pa las grub pa'o //
analyzed: mig sman zhes pa ni dreg pa las grub pa'o //
translated: The collyrium is made from soot.

original: las kyi bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs kyis de ltar bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs kyis de ltar bya'o //
translated: The application of the rite is to do it in the form of jealous-god-Yama.

original: mig sman dag ni zhes bya ba ni dreg pa des skud pa'i mdzub mo la'o //
analyzed: mig sman dag ni zhes bya ba ni dreg pa des skud pa'i mdzub mo la'o //
translated: The collyrium is the finger anointed with the soot.

original: mig sman grub pa ni gsum ste ji srid du dreg pa de 'bar ba las mig sman du byas pa des 'jig rten gsum du rgyu yang sus kyang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig sman grub pa ni gsum ste ji srid du dreg pa de 'bar ba las mig sman du byas pa des 'jig rten gsum du rgyu yang sus kyang mi mthong ngo //
translated: The accomplishment of eye ointment is threefold: As long as that soot burns, one should make eye ointment with it. By that, even though one travels in the three worlds, no one sees one.

original: mig sman gyi dreg pa la du ba byung na sa 'og gi dngos grub po //
analyzed: mig sman gyi dreg pa la du ba byung na sa 'og gi dngos grub po //
translated: If smoke arises from the soot of the eye ointment, there is the power of invisibility.

original: dro bar gyur pa'i mig sman gyi dreg pas ni 'gro ba kun gyis brtse bar bya'o //
analyzed: dro bar gyur pa'i mig sman gyi dreg pas ni 'gro ba kun gyis brtse bar bya'o //
translated: By the soot of the eye ointment that has become warm, all beings will love one.

original: 'bar ba la sogs phas ci byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'bar ba la sogs phas ci byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: What does one do with the burning, etc.?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / las kyi rdo rje rab sbyor ba //
analyzed: gsungs pa / las kyi rdo rje rab sbyor ba //
translated: By the application of the karmavajra,

original: zhes pa ste don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa ste don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: phrag dog gshin rje gshen gyi rnal 'byor gyis lag pa g-yas pas bkab ste /
analyzed: phrag dog gshin rje gshen gyi rnal 'byor gyis lag pa g-yas pas bkab ste /
translated: By the yoga of jealous Yamāntaka, one covers the right hand

original: dreg pa de ji srid 'bar gyi bar du bzlas par byas te du ba dang dro ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: dreg pa de ji srid 'bar gyi bar du bzlas par byas te du ba dang dro ba la yang ngo //
translated: and repeats the mantra as long as the soot burns, and also with the smoke and warmth.

original: gur gum zhes pa ni bud med kyi me tog go //
analyzed: gur gum zhes pa ni bud med kyi me tog go //
translated: Saffron is the flower of a woman.

original: khrag ces pa ni skyes bu bsad pa'i sha'o //
analyzed: khrag ces pa ni skyes bu bsad pa'i sha'o //
translated: Blood is the flesh of a man who has been killed.

original: de dag ni man ngag go //
analyzed: de dag ni man ngag go //
translated: These are the esoteric instructions.

original: rdo rje las kyi rab sbyor bas //🔽zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor dang 'dzin pa dang / gnyis po de dag kyang cha mnyam pa las gcig tu byas te thod par bcug la lag pas kha @270a * //
analyzed: rdo rje las kyi rab sbyor bas // zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor dang 'dzin pa dang / gnyis po de dag kyang cha mnyam pa las gcig tu byas te thod par bcug la lag pas kha @270a * //
translated: By the application of the vajra action,

original: bcad la dur khrod du ji srid grub pa gsum ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: bcad la dur khrod du ji srid grub pa gsum ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: the yogas of the jealous Yama, the retention, and the two of them made into one, should be placed in the skull-cup, the mouth of which is covered with the hand, and one should repeat the mantra until the three powers arise, as before.

original: bdud rtsi lnga zhes pa ni mu dang / bi dang / ra dang / su dang / ma'i mi mo mu sha lnga'i go ku da ha na'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga zhes pa ni mu dang / bi dang / ra dang / su dang / ma'i mi mo mu sha lnga'i go ku da ha na'o //
translated: The five nectars are the five human fleshes, the five human excretions, and the five human bones.

original: bcu po de dag cha mnyam pa'i ril bu nang gang ba tsam du gzung ngo //
analyzed: bcu po de dag cha mnyam pa'i ril bu nang gang ba tsam du gzung ngo //
translated: One should hold the pill, which is the size of a chick-pea, made of those ten things in equal parts.

original: lcags gsum gyis dkri zhes pa ni /
analyzed: lcags gsum gyis dkri zhes pa ni /
translated: One should wrap it with the three metals.

original: gser dang / dngul dang / zangs kyi snod du rim pa bzhin du ril bu byas te /
analyzed: gser dang / dngul dang / zangs kyi snod du rim pa bzhin du ril bu byas te /
translated: One should make the pill in a vessel of gold, silver, and copper, respectively.

original: de rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin man cha'i tshad gsum dang / bzhi dang / bzhi ru dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin man cha'i tshad gsum dang / bzhi dang / bzhi ru dbye ba'o //
translated: The three measures of the three are three, four, and four finger-breadths, respectively.

original: bdun dang gsum dang lnga'i ra ti sa lhag pa can gyi ril bur ga chung gi tshad tsam mo //
analyzed: bdun dang gsum dang lnga'i ra ti sa lhag pa can gyi ril bur ga chung gi tshad tsam mo //
translated: The pill is the size of a guggulu resin, with seven, three, and five parts.

original: las kyi sbyor ba la zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad ni sngar gyi bzhin no //
analyzed: las kyi sbyor ba la zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad ni sngar gyi bzhin no //
translated: All of the rest, beginning with in the performance of action, is as before.

original: ka na ta'i lcags kyi ral gri zhes pa ni gdong drug pa'i kan ta'i lcags kyi rgyu las byas te brdungs pa'i ral gri'o //
analyzed: ka na ta'i lcags kyi ral gri zhes pa ni gdong drug pa'i kan ta'i lcags kyi rgyu las byas te brdungs pa'i ral gri'o //
translated: The sword of Kanta iron is a sword made from the iron of the Kanta of the six-faced one, and forged.

original: las kyi sbyor ba la zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi rnam par lag pas gzung bar bya ste ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum ma byung ba de srid du bzlas pa yang sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: las kyi sbyor ba la zhes bya ba ni phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi rnam par lag pas gzung bar bya ste ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum ma byung ba de srid du bzlas pa yang sngar bzhin no //
translated: In the performance of action, one should hold it with the hand, and repeat it as before, until the three kinds of accomplishment arise.

original: las kyi ral gri zhes pa ni phag dog gshin rje gshed nyid kyi ral gri dang 'dra'o //🔽zhi ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa bzhag ste /
analyzed: las kyi ral gri zhes pa ni phag dog gshin rje gshed nyid kyi ral gri dang 'dra'o // zhi ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa bzhag ste /
translated: The sword of action is like the sword of the very one, the jealous one's Yamantaka.

original: mngon spyod la sogs pa las gzhan dag ni gtso bo gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pas te /
analyzed: mngon spyod la sogs pa las gzhan dag ni gtso bo gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pas te /
translated: Having set aside the pacifying and so forth as taught, the other actions, such as the fierce action, are accomplished by the principal one, Yamantaka.

original: bcom ldad 'das kyis gsal po nyid du ma gsungs kyang shugs las rtogs par bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldad 'das kyis gsal po nyid du ma gsungs kyang shugs las rtogs par bya zhes pa'o //
translated: Although the Lord did not state it clearly, it is to be understood by implication.

original: las kyi sbyor ba'i rim par phye ba zhes bya ba las ni sna tshogs pa'i phrin las so sor gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi sbyor ba'i rim par phye ba zhes bya ba las ni sna tshogs pa'i phrin las so sor gsungs pa'o //
translated: In the chapter called “The Procedure of the Ritual Actions of the Application,” the various ritual actions are taught.

original: sbyor ba ni de dag sgrub pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni de dag sgrub pa'i thabs so //
translated: “Application” is the means of accomplishing them.

original: de dag stod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs la yang le'u zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de dag stod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs la yang le'u zhes bya ste /
translated: The collection of texts that praises them is also called a “chapter.”

original: des na las kyi sbyor ba'i rim par phye ba'o //
analyzed: des na las kyi sbyor ba'i rim par phye ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the “procedure of the ritual actions of the application.”

original: rim par phye ba gsum pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rim par phye ba gsum pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the third chapter is finished.

original: // / zhi ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa brjod pa'i don du /
analyzed: // / zhi ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa brjod pa'i don du /
translated: Now, in order to state the procedure of the ritual actions of the machine that was taught in the pacification and so forth,

original: de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares “then” and so forth.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni /🔽gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni / gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
translated: “This”

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa bstod pa'i rgyal pos sngar gsungs pas bstod ces pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa bstod pa'i rgyal pos sngar gsungs pas bstod ces pa lhag ma'o //
translated: is the praise with the king of praises that was previously stated, “You, who are the nature of Vajra Delusion,” and so forth.

original: gsol ba gdab pa ni dris pa'o //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab pa ni dris pa'o //
translated: The request is the question.

original: las kyi dbye bas rab phye ba //
analyzed: las kyi dbye bas rab phye ba //
translated: The division of action is the division of action into pacification, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dbye ba ste zhi ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dbye ba ste zhi ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The division of action is the division of action into pacification, etc.

original: rab dbye ba zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa gang la @270b phul du gyur pa'i dbyibs khyad par du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rab dbye ba zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa gang la @270b phul du gyur pa'i dbyibs khyad par du gyur pa ste /
translated: The division of the best is the division of the best, which is the special shape of pacification, etc.

original: de yang lha'i gzugs su bsgoms pa la sogs pas bsgrub bya bsgrub pa las so //
analyzed: de yang lha'i gzugs su bsgoms pa la sogs pas bsgrub bya bsgrub pa las so //
translated: And that is accomplished by the practice of the one to be subdued through meditation on the form of the deity, etc.

original: rdo rje chen po zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The great vajra is Vajrasattva.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The oceans of intuition are the bodhisattvas.

original: nyes kun gso ba'i bdag nyid ces pa ni thams cad du skyon thams cad las thams cad yongs su grol ba'o //
analyzed: nyes kun gso ba'i bdag nyid ces pa ni thams cad du skyon thams cad las thams cad yongs su grol ba'o //
translated: The nature of the cure for all faults is the complete liberation of all from all faults everywhere.

original: 'dir las 'di ni ma rungs pa'i las su bsam par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir las 'di ni ma rungs pa'i las su bsam par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Here, this action should not be considered a bad action,

original: rnam pa 'di lta bus kyang pha rol po dag dmyal par 'gro ba la kun nas 'don pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bus kyang pha rol po dag dmyal par 'gro ba la kun nas 'don pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even in this way it is the complete deliverance of others from hell.

original: ji ltar gcong nad can la sman pa mkhas pas bsregs pa la sogs pa'i las bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar gcong nad can la sman pa mkhas pas bsregs pa la sogs pa'i las bzhin no //
translated: Just as a skilled physician burns a patient with a cauterizing iron, etc.🔽This is what is said by the words, in this way.

original: 'di skad kyis ni tshig ces pa ni /🔽'chad par 'gyur ba'i /
analyzed: 'di skad kyis ni tshig ces pa ni / 'chad par 'gyur ba'i /
translated: The wheel of the wheel of time is the wheel of the wheel of time.🔽The wheel of Yamântaka is the wheel of Yamântaka.🔽The wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.🔽The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.

original: 'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed //🔽ces bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed // ces bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.🔽The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.

original: rgyun du bya pa'i rim pa bla ma'i man ngag gzung ba'i don du gsungs pa /🔽de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyun du bya pa'i rim pa bla ma'i man ngag gzung ba'i don du gsungs pa / de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.

original: dbang gi don du 'khrul 'khor ni dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor ro //🔽ci brjod ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: dbang gi don du 'khrul 'khor ni dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor ro // ci brjod ce na gsungs pa /
translated: The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.🔽The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.🔽The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.

original: gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor zhes pa ni 'di lta bus kyang 'khrul 'khor gyi spyod yul gus par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor zhes pa ni 'di lta bus kyang 'khrul 'khor gyi spyod yul gus par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: The wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel is the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel of the wheel.

original: bsrung ba'i don du zhes pa ni zhi ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: bsrung ba'i don du zhes pa ni zhi ba'i don du'o //
translated: The

original: dbang du bya ba dang zhi ba dag la mngon par brjod pa ni zhi ba'i go ro tsa na gzung ste zhes brjod pa ste gnyis ka la yang go ro tsa na nyid kyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang du bya ba dang zhi ba dag la mngon par brjod pa ni zhi ba'i go ro tsa na gzung ste zhes brjod pa ste gnyis ka la yang go ro tsa na nyid kyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the case of subjugation and pacification, the recitation is “taking the pacifying gorocana,” and in both cases one should write with gorocana itself.

original: shog bu gang la bri bar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: shog bu gang la bri bar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: On what kind of paper should one write? It is said:

original: grog la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: grog la sogs pa ste /
translated: “on birchbark, etc.”

original: smyug ma'i shun pa zhes bya ba ni smyug ma'i tshigs kyi nang gi stong par gnas pa shog bu dang 'dra ba'i pags pa'o //
analyzed: smyug ma'i shun pa zhes bya ba ni smyug ma'i tshigs kyi nang gi stong par gnas pa shog bu dang 'dra ba'i pags pa'o //
translated: “Bamboo paper” is the skin that resembles paper and is found inside the joints of bamboo.

original: 'khor lo bri ba'i le'u drug pa las 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo bri ba'i le'u drug pa las 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained in chapter six, “The Wheel to be Drawn.”

original: dkyil 'khor rim pa gsum byas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //🔽na mo na ma rnams bstan la //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rim pa gsum byas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // na mo na ma rnams bstan la //
translated: “Having made a triple maṇḍala,” and so forth.🔽The word “namaḥ” is taught to be “namas.”

original: zhes bya ba ni na ma'i sgras na ma rnam par brten pa ste zhi ba la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na ma'i sgras na ma rnam par brten pa ste zhi ba la'o //
translated: Here, by the word “namaḥ” one should understand “namas,” that is, “pacification.”

original: 'dir nye bar mtshon pa las /
analyzed: 'dir nye bar mtshon pa las /
translated: Here, by the illustration,

original: las gang dang gang byed pa de dang der gsungs pa'i sngags kyis spel ba'o //
analyzed: las gang dang gang byed pa de dang der gsungs pa'i sngags kyis spel ba'o //
translated: whatever action one performs, one should do it with the mantra taught for that.

original: 'khor lo bris la gzhag pa'i gnas gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'khor lo bris la gzhag pa'i gnas gsungs pa /
translated: Having drawn the wheel, he states the place of its placement:

original: gnag dang zhes bya ba ni mdog gnag pa'o //
analyzed: gnag dang zhes bya ba ni mdog gnag pa'o //
translated: “Black” means dark-colored.

original: spu can zhes bya ba dbus kyi cha'o //
analyzed: spu can zhes bya ba dbus kyi cha'o //
translated: “Hairy” means the central part.

original: phyi dang nang dang dman pa dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: phyi dang nang dang dman pa dag kyang ngo //
translated: “Outer, inner, and inferior” also.

original: sogs pa'i sgra ni gas pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra ni gas pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word “etc.” includes cracks, movement, and so on.

original: gshin rje @271a * //
analyzed: gshin rje @271a * //
translated: Yama

original: gshed kyi bdag nyid du bsam zhes par 'brel te /
analyzed: gshed kyi bdag nyid du bsam zhes par 'brel te /
translated: is to be imagined as the nature of Yamāri.

original: ji lta bur 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bur 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: zla ba'i 'od zer dang 'dra ba /
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od zer dang 'dra ba /
translated: He is like the light rays of the moon.

original: gti mug gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: gti mug gshin rje gshed do //
translated: He is Delusion Yamāri.

original: bsgrub bya mdun du dgong ces bsgrub bya gzhan dag dang 'brel to //
analyzed: bsgrub bya mdun du dgong ces bsgrub bya gzhan dag dang 'brel to //
translated: The one to be accomplished is to be visualized in front.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'khrul 'khor nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor du bya ste /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'khrul 'khor nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor du bya ste /
translated: Residing on a moon maṇḍala means that the maṇḍala of the sun and moon is made in the machine.

original: de'i dbus su son pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su son pa'o //
translated: He is in the center of that.

original: bsgrub bya zhes pa ni gang zhi bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya zhes pa ni gang zhi bar bya ba'o //
translated: The one to be accomplished is the one to be pacified.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The perfect buddha

original: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros te /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros te /
translated: is emanated from the seed syllable in one’s heart.

original: gti mug gshin rje gshed du ma rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gti mug gshin rje gshed du ma rnams kyis so //
translated: The various forms of Delusion-Yamântaka.

original: de zhes pa ni bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni bsgrub bya'o //
translated: The him is the one to be accomplished.

original: bltas nas zhes pa ni de lta bu'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bltas nas zhes pa ni de lta bu'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Having looked means that one should imagine it in that way.

original: sngags brjod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngags brjod pa gsungs pa /
translated: The mantra is stated:🔽Oṃ dhṛṭa

original: aom dhri ti zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
analyzed: aom dhri ti zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
translated: and so forth.

original: thams cad kyi sngags nyid de dang por aom yig nas h'um yig gi mthar thug pas yi ge dgu'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi sngags nyid de dang por aom yig nas h'um yig gi mthar thug pas yi ge dgu'o //
translated: The mantra of all is that, beginning with the syllable oṃ and ending with the syllable hūṃ, it has nine syllables.

original: de'i pha rol du spel pa'i sngags gnyis kyi nang du song ba bsgrub bya'i ming bri ba'o //
analyzed: de'i pha rol du spel pa'i sngags gnyis kyi nang du song ba bsgrub bya'i ming bri ba'o //
translated: After that, the mantra to be expanded is written between the two, with the name of the one to be accomplished.

original: zhi ba'i dam tshig ni zhi ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhi ba'i dam tshig ni zhi ba'i sngags so //
translated: The pledge of peace is the mantra of peace.

original: gsungs pa'o zhes pa ni brjod zin pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa'o zhes pa ni brjod zin pa ste /
translated: Stated means that which has been expressed.

original: sngar gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel to //
analyzed: sngar gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel to //
translated: The previous Vajradhara is connected.

original: skyes pa zhi ba la snag tsha gang gis bri ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: skyes pa zhi ba la snag tsha gang gis bri ba gsungs pa /
translated: It is stated with what ink a man should write for peace:

original: skyes pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: skyes pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The man, and so forth.

original: lha la sogs pa yang bud med zhi ba'i cho ga de yis so //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa yang bud med zhi ba'i cho ga de yis so //
translated: The rite of peace for women is also with that.

original: de bzhin rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni skyes pa rgyas pa'i skabs su ni gur gum nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni skyes pa rgyas pa'i skabs su ni gur gum nyid kyis so //
translated: Likewise, “expansion” means that in the case of a male expansion, it is with saffron.

original: bud med rgyas pa la gang gis bri bar bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: bud med rgyas pa la gang gis bri bar bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that in the case of a female expansion, one should write with🔽saffron.

original: 'khor lo gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste bud med rgyas pa'i skabs su yang gur gum gyis so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor lo gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste bud med rgyas pa'i skabs su yang gur gum gyis so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “The two wheels” and so forth. The meaning is that in the case of a female expansion, it is with saffron.

original: sv'a h'a ming zhes pa ni sv'a h'a'i sgra des spel ba'o //
analyzed: sv'a h'a ming zhes pa ni sv'a h'a'i sgra des spel ba'o //
translated: “The word svāhā” means that it is expanded with the word svāhā.

original: dang po dang tha ma sv'a h'a'i sgras sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: dang po dang tha ma sv'a h'a'i sgras sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The first and last should be given with the word svāhā.

original: gang dang spel bar bya ba gsungs pa bsgrub bya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang dang spel bar bya ba gsungs pa bsgrub bya zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said that one should expand with whatever.

original: ci byas she na gsungs pa ming ni blangs nas ni zhes ba ste /🔽bsgrub bya'i ming gis spel bar bya //
analyzed: ci byas she na gsungs pa ming ni blangs nas ni zhes ba ste / bsgrub bya'i ming gis spel bar bya //
translated: What is done? It is said, “having taken the name.”

original: zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should expand with the name of the victim.

original: bris te 'khrul 'khor du gzhug ces pa lhag ma'o ;🔽/ kha dog ser po gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: bris te 'khrul 'khor du gzhug ces pa lhag ma'o ; / kha dog ser po gshin rje gshed //
translated: “Having written, one should place it in the machine” is the remainder.

original: ces bya ba ni phra ma gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phra ma gshin rje gshed do //
translated: “Yellow Yamāntaka” is the slander Yamāntaka.

original: zla ba ser po gnas zhes pa ni 'khrul 'khor nyid zla ba ser por bsams te der gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba ser po gnas zhes pa ni 'khrul 'khor nyid zla ba ser por bsams te der gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The statement “the yellow moon abides” means that one should meditate on the maṇḍala itself as a yellow moon, and that one should meditate on it as abiding there.🔽The statement “the yellow pot” means that one should meditate on the pot as a yellow pot.🔽The statement “the yellow cloth” means that one should meditate on the cloth as a yellow cloth.🔽The statement “the yellow man” means that one should meditate on the man as a yellow man.

original: bum pa ser po zhes pa ni snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i phra ma gshin rje gshed du ma'i lag @271b pas 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa ser po zhes pa ni snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i phra ma gshin rje gshed du ma'i lag @271b pas 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The statement “the yellow woman” means that one should meditate on the woman as a yellow woman.🔽The statement “the yellow cow” means that one should meditate on the cow as a yellow cow.🔽The statement “the yellow horse” means that one should meditate on the horse as a yellow horse.🔽The statement “the yellow elephant” means that one should meditate on the elephant as a yellow elephant.🔽The statement “the yellow sheep” means that one should meditate on the sheep as a yellow sheep.

original: boo shta ces pa ni boo sha ta'i sgras ming spel ba'o //🔽rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni rgyas pa'i cho ga'o //🔽dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: boo shta ces pa ni boo sha ta'i sgras ming spel ba'o // rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni rgyas pa'i cho ga'o // dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: The statement “the yellow bird” means that one should meditate on the bird as a yellow bird.🔽The statement “the yellow snake” means that one should meditate on the snake as a yellow snake.🔽The statement “the yellow dog” means that one should meditate on the dog as a yellow dog.🔽The statement “the yellow jackal” means that one should meditate on the jackal as a yellow jackal.🔽The statement “the yellow mouse” means that one should meditate on the mouse as a yellow mouse.🔽The statement “the yellow cat” means that one should meditate on the cat as a yellow cat.🔽The statement “the yellow tiger” means that one should meditate on the tiger as a yellow tiger.🔽The statement “the yellow lion” means that one should meditate on the lion as a yellow lion.🔽The statement “the yellow wolf” means that one should meditate on the wolf as a yellow wolf.🔽The statement “the yellow fox” means that one should meditate on the fox as a yellow fox.

original: gro ga'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gro ga'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement “the yellow monkey” means that one should meditate on the monkey as a yellow monkey.

original: ras ni khrag gis bsgos pa'i ras so //
analyzed: ras ni khrag gis bsgos pa'i ras so //
translated: The statement “the yellow man” means that one should meditate on the man as a yellow man.🔽The statement “the yellow woman” means that one should meditate on the woman as a yellow woman.

original: srin lag gi khrag ces pa ni gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa po dang / byed du 'jug par yang dag par rtsom pa ste /
analyzed: srin lag gi khrag ces pa ni gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa po dang / byed du 'jug par yang dag par rtsom pa ste /
translated: The statement “the yellow cow” means that one should meditate on the cow as a yellow cow.

original: de'i g-yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag gis so //🔽de dag kyang nges par sbyang bar bya ba'i rgya skye gsal sogs pas so so'am bsdus pas so //
analyzed: de'i g-yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag gis so //🔽de dag kyang nges par sbyang bar bya ba'i rgya skye gsal sogs pas so so'am bsdus pas so //
translated: The statement “the yellow horse” means that

original: yi ge ho yis zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: yi ge ho yis zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The word “and” is a conjunctive particle.

original: boo shta'i sgras kyang spel lo zhes nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: boo shta'i sgras kyang spel lo zhes nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: The word “also” indicates that one should increase with the word “vauṣaṭ.”

original: nag sogs bral ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bzhin no //
analyzed: nag sogs bral ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi bzhin no //
translated: “ Free from black and so forth” is as before.

original: kha dog khrag ces pa ni dmar po'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: kha dog khrag ces pa ni dmar po'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: “ Blood-colored” means having the nature of red.

original: gshin rje mthar byed ces pa ni bdag nyid 'dod chags gshin rje gshed du byas pas so //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed ces pa ni bdag nyid 'dod chags gshin rje gshed du byas pas so //
translated: “ Yamāntaka” is because one has made oneself into the wrathful deity of passion.

original: zla ba dmar po la gnas pa //
analyzed: zla ba dmar po la gnas pa //
translated: “ Residing on a red moon”

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khrul 'khor nyid zla ba dmar por bsam par byas la bsgrub bya der chud pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khrul 'khor nyid zla ba dmar por bsam par byas la bsgrub bya der chud pa'o //
translated: means that one should imagine the maṇḍala itself as a red moon, and the victim is placed there.

original: rang lus las byung 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: rang lus las byung 'od zer gyis //
translated: “ Light rays arising from one’s body”

original: zhes bya ba ni rang la gnas pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lha'i gzugs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang la gnas pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi lha'i gzugs so //
translated: means the form of the deity that arises from the light rays that arise from the seed syllable that resides in oneself.

original: khri tsam ni stong phrag bcu ste /
analyzed: khri tsam ni stong phrag bcu ste /
translated: “ Ten thousand” means ten thousand.

original: 'dir yang nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here also, it is for the sake of illustration.

original: las thams cad la yang sngags stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: las thams cad la yang sngags stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o //
translated: In all rites, one should recite the mantra ten thousand times.

original: sngags khri bzlas pa byas pas kyang bsgrub bya ma grub na bya ba'i khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: sngags khri bzlas pa byas pas kyang bsgrub bya ma grub na bya ba'i khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: If the one to be accomplished is not accomplished even by doing ten thousand recitations of the mantra, it is said that a special action is to be done.

original: gal te dbang du ma gyur na //
analyzed: gal te dbang du ma gyur na //
translated: If he does not come under one's control,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so forth.

original: de spro bar ni sngar gyi sngags bzlas par bya'o //🔽mar la mogs pa dpral byas la //
analyzed: de spro bar ni sngar gyi sngags bzlas par bya'o // mar la mogs pa dpral byas la //
translated: One should recite the former mantra in order to delight him.🔽Having anointed with ghee and having made a forehead🔽mark,

original: zhes pa ni mar dang sbrang gis gang ba'i kham phor kha sbyar nas gdon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mar dang sbrang gis gang ba'i kham phor kha sbyar nas gdon pa'o //
translated: one should take a joined pair of bowls filled with ghee and honey.

original: dgug pa bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: dgug pa bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate the summoning, it is said:

original: dur khrod ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dur khrod ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In a charnel ground, etc.

original: tshe la ke sa ni ras so //
analyzed: tshe la ke sa ni ras so //
translated: Life-tree means cloth.

original: yang ni'i sgra ni dang gi don te /
analyzed: yang ni'i sgra ni dang gi don te /
translated: The word also has the meaning of and.

original: 'chad pa'i dang du byas nas blangs te phyogs gzhan gyi don to //🔽des na rang byung gi me tog gi ras sam /
analyzed: 'chad pa'i dang du byas nas blangs te phyogs gzhan gyi don to // des na rang byung gi me tog gi ras sam /
translated: Having taken it, having made it into a paste, it is for the sake of the other.

original: dur khrod kyi ras la zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi ras la zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is the meaning of cloth of self-arisen flowers or cloth from a charnel ground.

original: khrag dang rgya skyegs phyed bsres pas //
analyzed: khrag dang rgya skyegs phyed bsres pas //
translated: Having mixed blood and lac,

original: zhes pa ni rgya skyegs sam rang gi lag pa'i srin lag gi khrag bsres pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgya skyegs sam rang gi lag pa'i srin lag gi khrag bsres pas so //
translated: This is done by mixing the blood of lac or of one's ring finger.

original: yi ge dza dang yi ge dhri zhes pa ni dang po dang tha mar dza dhri zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis sbyin par @272a * //🔽bya'o ; btsun mo yi ni padma'i snod //
analyzed: yi ge dza dang yi ge dhri zhes pa ni dang po dang tha mar dza dhri zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis sbyin par @272a * // bya'o ; btsun mo yi ni padma'i snod //
translated: The letters ja and dhrī are the two letters ja and dhrī which are given at the beginning and end.

original: ces pa ni bud med kyi thong ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni bud med kyi thong ba'o //
translated: The vessel of the queen's lotus is the hollow of a woman's palm.

original: kha sbyar zhes pa ni gnyis po de dag 'og dang steng du gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: kha sbyar zhes pa ni gnyis po de dag 'og dang steng du gzhag pa'o //
translated: The union is the placing of those two below and above.

original: dmar zhes pa ni 'dod chags gshin rje gshed do //
analyzed: dmar zhes pa ni 'dod chags gshin rje gshed do //
translated: The red one is Raktayamāri.

original: lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi /
analyzed: lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi /
translated: Summoned by the red hook

original: // zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pas bkug pa'o //
analyzed: // zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pas bkug pa'o //
translated: means summoned by light rays in the form of hooks from the seed syllable in one's heart.

original: zhags pa bcings zhes bya ba ni phyag g-yas pa'i mtshan ma padma dmar po'i lcug ma 'dzin pas 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: zhags pa bcings zhes bya ba ni phyag g-yas pa'i mtshan ma padma dmar po'i lcug ma 'dzin pas 'ching ba'o //
translated: Bound by the noose means bound by the sign of the right hand holding a red lotus vine.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of the wind mandala

original: zhes bya ba ni yam dmar po yongs su gyur ba las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa seng ge dmar po'o 'og tu blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yam dmar po yongs su gyur ba las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa seng ge dmar po'o 'og tu blta bar bya'o //
translated: The red yam is the wind maṇḍala, in the form of a bow, with a red lion facing downward, which arises from the transformation of the red yam.

original: rdzas lnga'i zhes pa ni mu dang / tsi dang / ra dang / su dang / ma yis so //
analyzed: rdzas lnga'i zhes pa ni mu dang / tsi dang / ra dang / su dang / ma yis so //
translated: The five substances are the five substances of mustard seed, lac, resin, sulfur, and mica.

original: dbang gi rab tu dbye bas ni dgug pa ste der ma brjod kyis kyang thams cad sngar bzhin du rtogs par bya'o /
analyzed: dbang gi rab tu dbye bas ni dgug pa ste der ma brjod kyis kyang thams cad sngar bzhin du rtogs par bya'o /
translated: By the division of the rite, there is summoning, which is not mentioned there, but should be understood as before.

original: mngon par 'dod pa ma grub pas las kyi khyad par gyi don du gsungs pa /🔽gal te bsgrub bya mi 'ong na //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa ma grub pas las kyi khyad par gyi don du gsungs pa / gal te bsgrub bya mi 'ong na //
translated: Since the desired goal is not accomplished, it is said for the sake of the special rite:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: If the victim does not come, and so on.
